extendedInfo.description: The Original: My Days - Period & Ovulation â¢Track & predict your period, ovulation and fertility.Features include:- Calendar- Multi User support- Multiple languages (en,de,it,es,fr,cn,tw)- Add personal info regarding birth control; notes, intercourse, pill, ..- eMail History to yourself or your Doctor- Backup- Basal metabolic temperature (BMT) Chart- 4 Widgets- Customizable colors+ Pro Trial Password lock & reminderMyDays is the perfect and simplest Calendar for every woman.(not just for women, many men find MyDays useful for understand their partner's cycle, too)Please feel free to send me an email with any concerns, problems or suggestions via my website listed below. I will answer all your questions ASAP. I can't answer directly in the Android Market. Thank you!Information, Hints & Tips:- Check the "About" page for the Pro Version  where you can disable ads, set a password, and set up alarms and notifications.- Internet permission is only required for the internal "web-based" community chat and for ads. Your data is private!- Pro users get the Pro version from the email they receive after purchase (update will overwrite the basic version with the pro version) or send me an email with your purchase email and full name.- If the Widget disappears after an update, simply restart your device.â¨ Also remember Widgets ONLY work when the app is installed internally, not when installed on the SD card.- If this version should force close on your device, try an older version here:â¨http://christian-albert-mueller.com/mydays/dl/mydays09basic.apk- Galaxy Nexus users: Do not enable "Hardware Acceleration" in the Settings. â¨While enabled, the app seems to appear in mini size on your screen.- After Backup to the SD Card always UN-MOUNT the card in your Device Settings before you remove the SD-Card. For more tips to fix device-specific SD-Card problems, please see my website here:â¨http://christian-albert-mueller.com/mydays/fix-sd-card-import-problems/Thank youYour 5-star ratings keep me working!

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: For me is this app the best - it\'s got a simple design, no unnecessary functions and an useful widget.
reviews.author: V\304\233ra Kame Hojdarov\303\241

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Absolutely love this app! useful and keeps me on track.its very simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome but could use more functions
reviews.comment: I love this app, and use it religiously. But I use Nuvaring, not the pill so it\'s a little harder to track. I have to put reminder notes in and there\'s no alarm function. It would also be nice if there were a spotting category for those of us with irregular periods. Other than that it\'s perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this app!...but....
reviews.comment: I\'m still wondering why it\'s necessary that this app be able to read phone state & identity? Until I know I won\'t re-install it, I really want to though... ALSO IT NEVER SAVES TO MY SD CARD PROPERLY SO EVERY TIME I GET A NEW PHONE I START OVER, THAT\'D BE NICE IF IT WAS FIXED ;)
reviews.author: Bethany Pettinger

reviews.title: Could update
reviews.comment: I absolutely LOVE this app. But I think it should be made to when u get a new phone or have to swipe ur old one you could re install this app and it still have all ur data on it from the first time u used it. Maybe have a username and password for when u download it and it syncs with ur gmail account Like ur markett. Would be a GREAT FEATURE!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App.
reviews.comment: This app is dead on. I have been using ovulation test along side of this app.and it hasn\'t failed me yet. Great for helping keep track of everything I need it to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the most useful apps ever
reviews.comment: Helped me conceive within the first few months of using it, and since I now know that prescription birth control can cause early abortion of a baby without the mother knowing, I don\'t use b/c. So I have been using it for birth control for 1 1/2 years now and it works perfectly. No problems at all. HTC Evo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The days  of putting a dot on your calendar are over!
reviews.comment: This app is a lifesaver. Great for ladies who WANT to get preggo as well as those who do NOT!  Even my hubby likes this app because he\'s able to easily see how often or not we make love!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love my days
reviews.comment: This app is great. I love knowing when my cycle is coming....and its so accurate. I also love tracking my fertility.....Thanks!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Love that this app keeps track of my period for me so I don\'t have to and predicts when and how long my next one will be plus ovulation timing. Had it for 6 months and love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best app ever!!!
reviews.comment: Perfect for all the busy women on the go... Take notes, keep track of your periods, your sex life, even ovulation! There is no guessing! Be prepared for your little gift every month, no more surprises! Thank you so much for this app!!!
reviews.author: Whitney Olawumi

reviews.title: Love it, but...
reviews.comment: My biggest annoyance with this app is lack of ability to change the labels. I am tracking to ensure my implant is working. I need a \"Spotting\" option. I love the simplistic design, if it had an option to change labels or a new spotting label, I would rate 5 stars.
reviews.author: Stormy Proffitt

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Love this app! So useful. I\'ve been using it for several months with no problems on my HTC Incredible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Neat
reviews.comment: I only use it to track my period, works great and user friendly. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Useful
reviews.comment: Even though I\'m not trying to get pregnant. This app helps me track my cycle from month to month. So much easier than writing it on a calendar. It would be helpful to have another way to save data (ie. a website with log in access)
reviews.author: Dee bennett-johnson

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Simple & easy to use. Very handy. Would be great if cycle length could be added to list & chart. Samsung galaxy 3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Omg I so freaking love that app....hey the creator u are freaking awesome....this app is unbelievable...and it can even help in calculating when u starts next....amazing....love it
reviews.author: Henrientta Irabor

reviews.title: My fave!!
reviews.comment: I LOVE THIS APP!!! It\'s by far the best app I have...It\'s so accurate & I feel like it knows my body better than I do ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app, love how I can set my own colours for each item. 2 tips improvement, a baby\'s due date prediction and ability to change ovulation date.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: I love this app its so accurate & is very helpful. I only wish there were more theme options. But. Other than that its great.
reviews.author: Tiera Moody
